text: If you think you can get into an admin job then do that. It’s all about finding your way round. And you never know you might enjoy it more than anything and pursued that as a proper career. Later if you do get any opportunity to try comping or grading try that as-well even if it’s for few days, but for now do what you think is easier to get in. Sometimes when you are actually working in a professional environment and show interest in different departments they might test you or give you a chance to try different things , then you will always learn what is best for you. I know professionals who have come from the managing backgrounds ending up doing compositing or vice versa. Also seen production managers getting into supervisor roles. Hope that helps. Good luck.
